info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 2:26AM CDT until July 06 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR WESTERN BEAVER AND SOUTHEASTERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 225 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Balko to 5 miles northeast of Hardesty, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 2 AM CDT, trained spotters reported quarter size hail 7 miles south southeast of Hooker. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Guymon, Beaver, Hooker, Optima, Hardesty, Elmwood, Adams, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Baker, Turpin and Balko. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
